quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to go to the south. After that, retrieve the type A latchkey from the trunk within the attic. Having picked up the type A latchkey, check that the type A locker is unlocked with the type A latchkey. And then, make sure that the type A locker is opened. After that, retrieve the keycard from the type A locker inside the attic. After that, unlock the box. And then, ensure that the box is open. And then, pick up the scarf from the box in the attic. After that, attempt to go to the north. After that, deposit the scarf on the floor of the launderette. Got that? Good!
commands: take type A latchkey from trunk
unlock type A locker with type A latchkey
take keycard from type A locker
take type A latchkey from trunk
unlock type A locker with type A latchkey
take keycard from type A locker

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a launderette. A normal one.

 You can make out a type T chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The type T chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type T chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a chamber.

 You can make out a locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You are in a restroom. A normal one.

 Oh, great. Here's a board. You shudder, but continue examining the board. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the board.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bathroom. An usual kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You make out a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] However, the table, like an empty table, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a study. An ordinary one.

 You can make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the stand. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]The stand appears to be empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stand.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You are in a vault. An usual one. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gate leading north.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen.

 You can make out a cabinet.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gate leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cookery. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a fridge.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The fridge is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You are in a laundromat.



 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar gateway leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a closet. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You are in a washroom. An ordinary one.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a Henderson's style safe. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The Henderson's style safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The Henderson's style safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You scan the room, seeing a drawer.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. An ordinary one. You begin to take stock of what's here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a basement.

 You see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 1 box.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The type 1 box contains [a list of things in the c_9]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a counter. The counter is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar gateway leading north. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A standard one.

 You scan the room, seeing a box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] standard looking type A locker in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type A locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The type A locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk right there by you.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. An ordinary one.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

 You can make out [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] What a letdown! You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

walkthrough: take type A latchkey from trunk
unlock type A locker with type A latchkey
take keycard from type A locker

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, make an effort to go to the south. With that accomplished, pick up the type A latchkey from the trunk. Then, check that the type A locker within the attic is unlocked with the type A latchkey. After that, make it so that the type A locker is open. Then, retrieve the keycard from the type A locker within the attic. And then, unlock the box inside the attic. And then, open the box. Having pulled open the box, recover the scarf from the box. Then, go north. Then, deposit the scarf on the floor of the launderette. Alright, thanks!
